code: import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import{applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import reducers from"./Reducers/index";import thunk from'redux-thunk';var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=configureStore({reducer:reducers},composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk)));export default store;
